text: Va [ej pajomʙar] agar rūjgardonii onon [az Qur'on] ʙar tu noguvor [va duşvor] ast, agar metavonī naqʙe (tunel) dar zamin jo nardʙone dar osmon ʙiçūī, to mu'çiza [digar] ʙarojaşon ʙijovarī [pas, cunon kun, vale sude nadorad].Va agar Alloh taolo mexost, hatman, ononro ʙar [masiri] hidojat çam' mekard, pas, hargiz az nodonon maʙoş
